attributes.review: this app not only made me have nightmares but it made me have me horrible cramps and terrible diarrhea.. the app itself makes me want to vomit every time I see it. I had no choice but to delete it 😞☹️
attributes.title: it’s a NO from me

attributes.review: i downloaded this app and then my phone started to smell really really bad????? which was so weird i didn’t think it was possible. i contacted a nearby phone repair shop and the first thing they did was ask me if i got this app. i said yes ofc trump 2020 yknow? and they told me that downloading it makes the phone smell bad bc of some download system or smth??? and now i have to get a completely different phone????? smh....
attributes.title: stinky 👎🏻

attributes.review: Don’t download this app for your safety!! Security researchers have stated that users are at risk of hackers accessing their information (politico). Also, this app purposely uses misleading articles and false data to convince people about a false narrative. SAVE YOUR INFORMATION AND DELETE THIS APP!
attributes.title: WORST EVER! VULNERABLE APP!

attributes.review: I wanted to help, but the app didn’t really give any direction as to how. In fact, all it did was give me detailed instructions on how to commit voter fraud and purchase illegal fireworks. Idk... kind of disappointed. #Trump2020
attributes.title: Not a great app in the slightest

attributes.review: I honestly hate this app so much there are not enough words to explain it. If there is one thing I know it’s that Gen Z don’t go down without a fight. If you wanna take tiktok down go ahead and we will take down your app☺️
attributes.title: THE WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: this morning i downloaded the trump 2020 app to see the latest news updates. as soon as i signed up and entered my phone number, i was completely dissatisfied. i'm having a hard time trying to navigate different parts of this app, and often times needed help from my spouse to use it. please do not download this app. so disappointed.
attributes.title: very hard to navigate/use

attributes.review: An absolutely terrible app, makes my phone crash, is full of spam and isn’t any good. The app works like garbage and is so low quality you’d think a toddler designed it. The WORST app
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: I got the app to see what the oranges had to say and let me tell you this app is the worst app on here. -23/10 , I didn’t want to give it even 1 star but b it’s the lowest I could go 🤡🤡🤡🤡
